GSP31jaymangu:4: prekṣāvanto 'nukte prayojane na kvacitpravartanta iti prayojanamucyate tattvajñānānmokṣaḥ tattvāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:7: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:39: kena khalvimāni duḥkhānyutpadyanta iti tadavaghātako heturjijñāsyo bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:41: sa ca pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānānnānya iti manasi vartate //
GSP31jaymangu:51: tataśca dṛṣṭe hetau sati jijñāsā 'smin viṣaye nirarthaketyāśaṅkyāha- 'naikāntātyantato 'bhāvāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:55: dṛṣṭe hyupāye kriyamāṇe 'pi keṣāṃcidduḥkhatrayaṃ bhavatyeveti naikāntenopaśamaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:72: iyanto devā asmin svarga iti jñātavantaḥ jñānamasmākamutpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:92: tathā cāhuḥ - 'bahūnīndrasahasrāṇi vyatītāni yuge yuge'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:96: tathāhi- yaḥ kratuśatena yajate tasya mahadaiśvaryam,
GSP31jaymangu:100: dṛṣṭānuśravikadvārā yo viparītaḥ tattvajñānākhyaḥ sa śreyān /
GSP31jaymangu:126: prakriyata utpadyate pradhānāt asyā iti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:134: mahān buddhissa ādyo yāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ tāstathoktāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:138: tanmātrāṇi śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca yathākramamākāśavāyvagnyudakapṛthivyākhyāni bhūtāni janayantaḥ prakṛtayaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:169: nanu cānyānyapi pratibhādīni pramāṇāni santi tadyathā-
GSP31jaymangu:175: tatra grāme nagare vā vartata iti pratibhotpannā /
GSP31jaymangu:183: tatra gavayamajānānaḥ kaścidāptaṃ pṛcchati 'kīdṛśo gavayaḥ', iti /
GSP31jaymangu:187: tadāpi gavi dṛṣṭenaiva viṣāṇādinā liṅgena gavayasya vyavahāraṃ pravartayatītyanumānameva na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP31jaymangu:198: 'māṣaḥ prastha ityukte catvāraḥ kuḍapā itīdamapi sambhavati';
GSP31jaymangu:202: 'devadatto divā na bhuṅkte balavāṃścetyukta arthādrātrau bhuṅkte';
GSP31jaymangu:204: tata eva rātrau tasya pratītiranumānānna bhidyate /
GSP31jaymangu:206: kiṃ pramāṇatrayalakṣaṇe prayojanamiti cedāha- 'prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇāddhi'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:220: śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu yathākramaṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇendriyadvāreṇa viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā yā buddhirutpadyate tad dṛṣṭam,
GSP31jaymangu:225: tatra dūrāt kvacidāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā devadattasārūpyaṃ vyapadiśati devadatto 'yamiti yā buddhirutpadyate tatsavikalpam,
GSP31jaymangu:249: kadācitkokilaṃ liṅginaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrāvyeṇāpi virutenāsya bhavitavyamiti tayorgamyagamakatvaṃ sati sambandhe /
GSP31jaymangu:250: sambandhāśca sapta- tatra svasvāmibhāvasambandho yathā rājapuruṣayoḥ kadācitpuruṣeṇa rājā rājñā vā puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:262: nirvairaḥ pūjitaḥ sadbhirāpto jñeyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:270: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kaḥ kasya viṣaya ityata āha-
GSP31jaymangu:285: pratyakṣe tu prameye dṛṣṭameva vyāpriyata ityarthāduktam // 6 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:319: sadṛśānāṃ rāśīkaraṇāt dhānyarāśau hyeko dhānyaguḍakaḥ prakṣipto na dṛśyate /
GSP31jaymangu:325: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtisarūpaṃ virūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31jaymangu:329: yathā ghaṭasyotpatteḥ prāk mṛt śarādiṣu.... tasya pradhvaṃsābhāvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:333: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tau sta iti gamyata ityāha- 'kāryatastadupalabdheḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:334: yadyapyatrobhayaṃ prakrāntaṃ tathāpi tacchabdena pradhānaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP31jaymangu:338: mahān buddhiḥ sa ādiryasya tanmahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ kāryamasti /
GSP31jaymangu:358: yadeva sat ghaṭādidravyaṃ tadeva mṛtpiṇḍādinā kāraṇaviśeṣeṇa kriyate, nāsat //
GSP31jaymangu:360: iha yadarthaṃ yadupādīyate tasya tadupādānaṃ kāraṇam,
GSP31jaymangu:363: atra tailaṃ dadhi ca yadi na syāt kathaṃ tasyopādānasya grahaṇaṃ tadarthibhiḥ kriyate /
GSP31jaymangu:367: yadyasatkāryaṃ bhavet tadā sarvasya sarvatra sambhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31jaymangu:377: evaṃ ca tacchakanīyaṃ yadi kāraṇe śaktirūpeṇāvasthitaṃ syāt /
GSP31jaymangu:381: yadyasatkāryamutpadyate kimiti kāraṇabhāvena kāryasya bhāvo bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:389: asatsvabhāvebhyo hyutpādyetetyevaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ sadevotpadyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 9 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:391: evaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ sadevotpadyata iti vyavasthāpya prakṛtevirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca darśayati /
GSP31jaymangu:430: yadyasmādutpannaṃ mahadādi vyaktaṃ tadeva tadāśritaṃ nānyat /
GSP31jaymangu:439: pralayakāle hyākāśādayaḥ pañca yathākramaṃ śabdāditanmātreṣu līyante,
GSP31jaymangu:452: yadasmādutpadyate tadevānuruddhya svakāryaṃ janayati na tadvyatirekeṇeti darśanārtham /
GSP31jaymangu:480: mahato 'ṅkāra ityādinā svakāryotpādanadharmatvādyathā vyaktāvyaktayorvairūpyaṃ sārūpyaṃ ca,
GSP31jaymangu:481: tathā kiṃ puruṣasya vāpītyāha- 'tadviparītastathā ca pumān'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:513: na kiṃcidanena liṅgyate na vāyaṃ kadācillīyate 'nutpannatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:541: ke ke trayo guṇāḥ kimātmakā ityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:545: prītyādaya ātmāno yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ te tathoktāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:554: kimiti te guṇāḥ parasparasavyapekṣāḥ kiṃ vā netyāha- 'anyo 'nyābhibhavāśrayajananamithunavṛttayaśca guṇāḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:574: tatra yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ tadā rajastamasī nyakkṛtaśaktike /
GSP31jaymangu:583: rajaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:586: itare tu tau eva pravṛttiṃ janayanta iti darśayannāha- anyo 'nyavṛttaya iti /
GSP31jaymangu:591: ) sitatvātsāttvikī sā bharttuḥ sukhamutpādayati sapatnīnāṃ kāsāṃcidduḥkhaṃ kāsāṃcidviṣādamityatra sattvamātmano dvayośca vṛttihetuḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:595: svāminaśca tuṣṭimityatra raja ātmano dvayosca vṛttihetuḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:597: tāmasāḥ, te varṣantaḥ proṣitabhartṛkāṇāṃ viṣādaṃ janayanti,
GSP31jaymangu:598: pathikānāṃ duḥkham kṛṣīvalānāṃ tuṣṭimityatra tama ātmano dvayośca vṛttihetuḥ // 12 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:601: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:605: iṣṭaṃ sāṃkhyācāryāṇāṃ sattvaṃ laghusvabhāvaṃ prakāśaṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:608: bāhyāni ca dravyāṇi laghūni prakāśātmakāni nirmalāni bhavanti //
GSP31jaymangu:627: nanu caite parasparavilakṣaṇā guṇā viruddhatvāt kathaṃ sambhūyaikatra vartanta ityāha- 'pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:631: tamasi sthitā ghaṭādayo devadattasya prakāśayitavyā iti,
GSP31jaymangu:635: nanu ca 'triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi vyaktam',
GSP31jaymangu:645: kathaṃ? yasmādguṇā evāvivekino bhogyāssāmānyā acetanā prasavadharmiṇaśca,
GSP31jaymangu:646: te ca vyakte siddhā iti siddho guṇaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:655: kāraṇasya yo guṇaḥ sa ātmā svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam /
GSP31jaymangu:658: śuklaiḥ kṛṣṇairvā tantubhirārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:667: kāryatastadupalabdhermahadādi tacca kāryamityanenaiva sādhite 'smin yathāvadadhigate punardārḍhyārthaṃ samanantaropādānam /
GSP31jaymangu:681: ya ekajātyanugatā bhedāsteṣāmekameva tathābhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31jaymangu:689: tataśca prāk ca pravṛtterjanitayā śaktyā bhavitavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:697: anyathā ghaṭāsyodakāharaṇakriyā yā na sā mṛtpiṇḍasya,
GSP31jaymangu:709: bāhyāni ca kāraṇāni pṛthivyā dhṛtisaṅgrahapattivyūhanāvakāśadānaiḥ parasparamupakurvanti /
GSP31jaymangu:716: yathādhyātmikānāṃ bāhyānāṃ copakāryopakārakabhāvo buddhikṛta iva dṛśyate tadasya kaścidvyavasthāpitā syāt,
GSP31jaymangu:729: pralayakāle vaiśvarūpyaṃ kva līyate sthityutpattipralayājjagata iti /
GSP31jaymangu:743: yadi kāraṇamastyavyaktaṃ tatkathaṃ pravartata ityāha- 'triguṇatassamudayācca'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:744: yadā prakṛtisthā guṇāssāmyena pravartante tadā (trīnevādhikṛtya pravarante naikaikamityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:749: yadi samudayādavyaktaṃ pravartate tasmādutpannaṃ tadavya...smānna bhavati //
GSP31jaymangu:750: śuklebhyaḥ kṛṣṇebhyo vā tantubhyaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā paṭo bhavatītyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:754: yathā kaṇikāyāḥ sūkṣmāyā mūlakaḥ śākhāpraśākhādipravṛddho mahānvanaspatirvyakto bhavati,
GSP31jaymangu:760: yathā salilamantarikṣādekarasamapi tadekasya kaṭvamlāderguṇasyāśrayabhūtasya viśeṣānnānārasaṃ vartate evamavyaktamapīti guṇātmakatvādekaikaguṇāśrayaviśeṣānnānārūpaṃ pravartate /
GSP31jaymangu:765: evamavyaktasyāstitvaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca prasādhya puruṣāstitvaṃ prasādhayitumāha-
GSP31jaymangu:772: iha loke saṃghātabāhyāḥ śayanāsanādayo ye te parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:773: te hi devadattasya parasyārthaṃ kurvanti na svārtham /
GSP31jaymangu:778: nanu mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ śarīrameva puruṣo nānyaḥ kaścidityatrāha- 'triguṇādiviparyayāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:785: mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ śarīramiha loke yadadhiṣṭhānaṃ tatparādhiṣṭhitaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP31jaymangu:799: yaśca bhoktā sa eva puruṣaḥ sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvāt /
GSP31jaymangu:808: tatra yadi puruṣo na syāttadā tadarthā pravṛttirna bhavet /
GSP31jaymangu:811: eka evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvaśarīreṣu sthita ityeke /
GSP31jaymangu:815: tasmādagnesa..viṣphuliṅgāḥ pratiśarīraṃ puruṣā ābirbhūtā iti vedāntavādinaḥ // 17 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:824: kutaḥ ? - nityatāt tatra yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāttadaikasmin jāyamāne mriyamāṇe vā sarveṣāṃ jananamaraṇe syātām /
GSP31jaymangu:840: tatra yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāttadaikasmin sāttvike rājase tāmase vā,
GSP31jaymangu:843: purāṇapuruṣādagneriva viṣphuliṅgāḥ pratiśarīraṃ puruṣā ityasminnapi darśane puruṣabahutvamastyeva /
GSP31jaymangu:844: teṣāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇatvāt te purāṇapuruṣādabhinnā bhinnā veti darśanadvayam /
GSP31jaymangu:851: yaḥ prāgukto viparyayaḥ- triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ - ityādinā,
GSP31jaymangu:857: paśyati śṛṇoti sarvama karoti sthitiṃ prasaṅgaṃ ca nāpi /
GSP31jaymangu:859: yaścodāsīnaḥ sa sākṣyapi bhavati pradhānasambandhinaḥ kriyākalāpasya nirguṇatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:861: nanu ca yadyakartā tatkathaṃ- bhoktṛbhāvādasti puruṣaḥ- ?
GSP31jaymangu:864: puruṣo 'pi viṣayaphalānāṃ svayamakṛtānāṃ tathāpi bhoktā // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:867: nanu ca yadyacetanamavyaktaṃ kathaṃ dehendriyasaṃjñamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmādharmādiṣu pravarttate,
GSP31jaymangu:872: tena puruṣeṇa yaḥ saṃyogastasmādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:875: yadi tadeva triguṇātmakaṃ kartṛ na pumān,
GSP31jaymangu:876: kathaṃ puruṣo gacchatītyucyata ityāha- 'guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:881: yathā svāmī svayamayoddhāpi yaudhabhṛtyasaṃyogād yoddheti vyapadiśyate,
GSP31jaymangu:899: dṛṣṭvā sa sarvāṃ vibhūtimanubhūya virasatvād viraktaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānena tyajyate /
GSP31jaymangu:900: tyaktasya kaivalyamityato darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ ca dvayorapi saṃyogo matsyodakavadudumbaramaśakaśca //
GSP31jaymangu:903: paṅguḥ sacakṣuḥ paśyati panthānaṃ na saṃcarati,
GSP31jaymangu:909: evaṃ puruṣo niṣkriyaḥ pradhānena saṃyujya tadvibhūtidarśanāya devādiṣu saṃcarati /
GSP31jaymangu:912: nanu ca saṃyogamātreṇa kathaṃ darśanaṃ kaivalyaṃ cetyāha- 'tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:919: prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇamavyaktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ tamobahulamavyākṛtamiti prakṛtiparyāyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:933: ṣoḍaśād gaṇādyāni pañca tanmātrāṇi tebhya ekottaravṛddhyā pañca mahābhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:983: īśitvaṃ prabhutā (yena sthāvarādīni bhūtāni sandeśakārīṇi bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1035: tatastaijasamahaṅkāraṃ kriyāśīlaṃ sahāyamapekṣyaikādaśakaṃ pañcakaṃ ca malājanayata (?) iti // 25 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:1065: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ ca svasvaviṣayagrahaṇakāle buddhīndriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1066: ubhayatrāpyasya vyāpārāditi lakṣaṇaṃ tadityāha- saṅkalpayatīti saṅkalpakam,
GSP31jaymangu:1078: ahaṅkārasthā ye guṇāḥ sattvādayasteṣāmanyo 'nyābhibhavāśrayā (dvidvāreṇa yaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣastata evaiṣāṃ nānātvam /
GSP31jaymangu:1083: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanāni śirasi bahiḥ pṛthak pṛthagavasthitāni bāhyavṛttīni /
GSP31jaymangu:1087: ye cānye viṣayabhedā deśaniyamavṛtiniyamābhyāṃ te 'pi guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣādeva /
GSP31jaymangu:1095: teṣu yathākramaṃ pañcānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāmālocanamātraṃ vṛttiriṣyate sāṃkhyācāryaiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1098: tathā hi buddhyavasitamarthaṃ puruṣaḥ cetayata iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1099: karmendriyāṇāmapi vāgādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ vasanādānādīni vṛttayaḥ karmāṇi /
GSP31jaymangu:1119: eṣāṃ ca buddhyādīnāṃ trayodaśānāṃ caturvidhā vṛttiḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1130: prāṇā ādyā yeṣāṃ vāyūnāṃ te prāṇādyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1134: yena kāye 'gnirdīpita āhāraṃ ca pacati sa samānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1136: yaḥ sarvaśarīraṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ sa vyānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1141: dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31jaymangu:1147: tathā hi cakṣuṣālocitaṃ buddhyādhyavasitamahaṅkāreṇātmīkṛtaṃ manasā saṅkalpitamiti //
GSP31jaymangu:1150: mandaprakāśe sthāṇupuruṣocitāmūrdhvatāṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ kiṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣa iti vikalpaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1154: thāvṛttiḥ sā kasmin viṣaya ityāha - 'dṛṣṭe'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1162: atha yadetaccatuṣṭayaṃ tatkiṃ yugapat parasparasavyapekṣaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛtiṃ pratipadyate kiṃ vā nirapekṣamityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1164: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31jaymangu:1169: tatra bhūtāṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ vṛttiṃ catvāri karaṇāni pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1171: evaṃ buddhirahaṅkāro manaśca trayāṇāmākūtaṃ jñātvā 'dhyavasāyamabhimānaṃ saṅkalpanaṃ ca pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1180: evaṃ bāhyānyapi karaṇāni svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ pratipadyante //
GSP31jaymangu:1181: etāni kimātmārthaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyante,
GSP31jaymangu:1186: sa eva buddhyādikalāpaṃ sṛṣṭavān yena puruṣasyārthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1190: pradhānavyatirekeṇa na kaścidbuddhyādikaraṇaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ kārayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1194: niścetanatvāt prakṛteḥ sacetano 'dhiṣṭhātā kartā 'paro gaveṣyata iti cet,
GSP31jaymangu:1212: tatra kasya kā kriyā yadapekṣayā karaṇamityāha- 'tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram'; /
GSP31jaymangu:1219: tatra śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañceti daśadhā /
GSP31jaymangu:1234: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1247: tenāntaḥkaraṇasya dvividho viṣayaḥ- dvāraṃ bhogyaṃ ceti /
GSP31jaymangu:1251: kalyata iti kālaḥ viṣaya evātīto 'nāgato vartamānoścocyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1254: tatra sāmprato vartamānaḥ kālo yasya bāhyasya taddhi bāhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1267: yathā ca mano vartamānaṃ saṅkalpayatīti tathātītānāgatāvapi /
GSP31jaymangu:1268: tatra kimidaṃ bhūtaṃ syāt, na mameti /
GSP31jaymangu:1271: nanu ca yadi sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayaste viśeṣāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1275: vāgbhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāṇi tu pañcaviṣayīṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31jaymangu:1277: teṣāmapi trayodaśānāṃ karaṇānāṃ yāni pañca buddhīndriyāṇi,
GSP31jaymangu:1279: śabdādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dvividhāḥ - viśeṣā aviśeṣāśca /
GSP31jaymangu:1283: ta eva viṣayā vidyante yeṣāmiti matvarthopaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1297: pāyurupasthaśca śabdādimadeva malaṃ śukraṃ ca visṛjati /
GSP31jaymangu:1298: anena dvāreṇa tu sarvaṃ bāhyaṃ karaṇaṃ pañcaviṣayameva draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1310: 'sarvam'; iti / triṣvapi kāleṣu vyavasthitaṃ viṣayamavagāhate gṛhṇāti yasmāt ,
GSP31jaymangu:1316: nanu ca yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ bāhyakaraṇadvāreṇa sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate,
GSP31jaymangu:1319: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31jaymangu:1320: 'ete'; ityādi / śrotrādayo vāgādayo buddhyādayaścetyete trayodaśa guṇaviśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1321: traya eva guṇā anyo 'nyābhibhavadvāreṇa pariṇatāḥ śrotrādivyapadeśabhāja ityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1326: na taditareṣāmapi yadi syādetenaiva viṣayāvagāhanaṃ siddhaṃ kimanyena //
GSP31jaymangu:1328: trailokyagataṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ sūkṣmasthūlaviṣayalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśyābhivyaktiṃ nītvā paścādahaṅkārādayo dvādaśa buddhau prayacchanti,
GSP31jaymangu:1331: tasyāṃ ca viṣayopadhānoparaktyāṃ buddhau puruṣa upalabhate /
GSP31jaymangu:1334: nanu ca tulye karaṇatve kimityahaṅkārādayo buddhau prayacchanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1337: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31jaymangu:1340: devamanuṣyatiryagyoniśu yo viṣayasyopabhogastaṃ prati sarvaṃ trailokyagataviṣayaṃ puruṣasya sādhayati,
GSP31jaymangu:1347: yadā tamasvatī buddhirbhavati tadā sarvamupanītaṃ sampādayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1373: te ca kiṃsvarūpā ityāha- 'śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1383: ye sūkṣmāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrasyāśrayatāṃ gatāste 'pi viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1392: yāni mahābhūtāni bāhyāni śāntaghoramūḍhānyuktāni tāni sthūlaśarīrasyāvakāśavyūhanapattikledanadhāraṇakartṛtvena prakṛṣṭabhūtānyucynte /
GSP31jaymangu:1423: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /
GSP31jaymangu:1431: tairvinā yathā cchāyā snigdhā paruṣā vā na tiṣṭhati //
GSP31jaymangu:1439: na ca nirādhāreṇa karaṇena puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1451: yathaika eva naṭastaṃ taṃ viśeṣamāsthāya yavanikānto nirgatya rājāmātyaviduṣakādibhāvenānuviddho 'vatiṣṭhate,
GSP31jaymangu:1452: tathā liṅgamapi taṃ taṃ dehamāsthāya devamanuṣyatiryagbhāvena vyavatiṣṭhate //
GSP31jaymangu:1458: kimetatsarvamīśvarāt kiṃ vā svabhāvādityatrāha- 'prakṛteḥ vibhutvayogāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1462: pradhānenaiva hi puruṣasyārthaḥ kartavya iti mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgamutpādya dharmādibhiradhivāsayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1476: yadāha- 'dharmādyā dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇāśrayiṇaḥ kāryāśrayiṇaśca kalalādyāḥ'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1524: yo viṣayādidarśanādvirakto yamaniyamaparisthito na jñānaṃ paryeṣate,
GSP31jaymangu:1525: tasya mṛtasya vairāgyādaṣṭāsyu prakṛtiṣu pradhānāditanmātraparyantāsu layaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1527: tallīnaścātmānaṃ muktamiva manyate na tu muktam,
GSP31jaymangu:1529: yadā tu jñānaṃ paryeṣyate tadā mucyata eva /
GSP31jaymangu:1532: ityevaṃ jāyate mokṣo mukta ātmastha ucyate // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1543: eṣāmaṣṭānāṃ buddhirūpāṇāmekena mokṣaḥ saptabhirbandhaḥ saṃsāra iti yadetannimittanaimittikaṃ ṣoḍaśamuktaṃ tatsaṃkṣepeṇa caturvidhamāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1555: tasya catuvidhasya punaḥ pañcāśat bhedā bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1567: ajñānākhyasya sargasya bhedāḥ pañca- tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro 'ndhatāmisraśceti /
GSP31jaymangu:1575: tayorvaikalyādaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā yasyāḥ aśakteḥ sā bhavatīti vibhaktipariṇāmena yojyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1593: tataśca teṣāmaṣṭāsveva prakṛtiṣu layo bhavatīti aṣṭavidhā avidyā,
GSP31jaymangu:1603: sa ca divyādivyaviṣayeṣu vartamāno daśavidho bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1610: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1614: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1618: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe viṣaya eva bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1639: te kiyanta ityāha- 'saptadaśadhā ca buddhervupayayāstuṣṭisiddhīnām'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1656: saiva vyaktātmanā pariṇamya bandhamokṣau kuruta ityetāvanmātropadeśāt tuṣṭo bhavati yastasya prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭirambha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1661: ityasmādadvitīyādupadeśādihaiva muktiḥ prāptavyeti parituṣṭaḥ pravrajito 'yaṃ tasya dvitīyā upādānākhyā tuṣṭiḥ salilamucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1663: mahadādisūkṣmaparyantena liṅgena saṃsaratā 'pareṇa mokṣo na prakṛtyupādānamātrādihaiva
GSP31jaymangu:1664: janmanīti tasmāttṛtīyādupadeśāt tuṣṭo yaḥ kālāpekṣī sthitastasya kālākhyā tuṣṭirodha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1667: kaścidviparītabhāgadheyo 'stīti tasmāccaturthādupadeśāt tuṣṭo yo bhāgyāpekṣī sthitastasya caturthī vṛṣṭirityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1668: etāścatasra ātmānamadhikṛtya bhavantītyādhyātmikāḥ ātmanā moktavyamiti kṛtvā //
GSP31jaymangu:1672: tatra viṣayārjane mahadduḥkhaṃ tadalpaviṣayebhya ityārjanadoṣadarśanānnivṛttasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ pañcamī sutāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1676: viṣayā ārjituṃ rakṣituṃ kṣaye ca pratividhātuṃ śakyāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1678: tadaprāptau ca mahadduḥkhamiti saṅgadoṣadarśanāduparastasyāṣṭamī tuṣṭiranuttamāmbha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1679: sarvaṃ śakyaṃ kintvanupahatya bhūtāni na bhogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1680: bhūtopaghātānmahadaniṣṭaphalamiti hiṃsādoṣadarśanāduparatasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ navamī uttamāmbha ityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1684: tatra prakṛtyupādānakālā na mokṣopāyā ityupadiṣṭamapi yo vaimukhyānna pratipadyate tasyādhyātmikāścatasraḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1699: janmāntarasaṃskṛtadhiyo yasya bandhamokṣakāraṇamutprekṣamāṇasya pradhānapuruṣāntarajñānamutpadyate tasya siddhirūhahetukā prathamā tāramityucyate
GSP31jaymangu:1711: pūrvā yāstisraḥ siddhyayastā na duḥkhahetukā iti boddhavyāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1722: yaḥ śakto 'pi sāṃkhyaśāstraṃ śṛṇvannapi buddhidaurbalyānna buddhyati tasya śabdahetukā asiddhiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1724: yasya gurupūrvakaṃ nādhyayanaṃ buddhidoṣādeva tasyānadhyayanahetukā asiddhiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1725: na yatra mitrasaṃgraho na ca dānamityaṣṭāvasiddhayo buddhivadhā aśaktāvantarbhūtāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1729: tasyā aṣṭavidhāyāḥ siddheryaḥ pūrvo viparyayāśaktituṣṭyākhyastrividha uktaḥ so 'ṅkuśa ivetyaṅkuśa uktaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1731: tatra viparyayādiṣyate bandha iti vacanāt pañcavidhamajñānamaṅkuśaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1736: viṣayoparamācca mukta ityetāvanmātrādupadeśāt tuṣṭo na jñānaṃ paryeṣyati /
GSP31jaymangu:1743: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1753: tatra kiṃ bhāvā api pūrvamutpannāḥ kiṃ liṅgamevetyatrāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1758: yadi bhāvā na pūrvotpannāstairvinā liṅgamapi nāsti /
GSP31jaymangu:1763: yasmādevaṃ tasmāt liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyaśca dviprakāraḥ pradhānatvāt sargo bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1766: yathā dvāvetau pūrvotpannau tatha bhūtasargo 'pīti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1803: sthūlaśarīre sattvayi kaścideva kvacidadhikyena vartata iti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1822: tadeva tarhi sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpnoti,
GSP31jaymangu:1824: tatra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1832: tatra mātuḥ kukṣau andhatamasīva praviṣṭasya saṅkucanaprasāraṇaduḥkhaṃ garbhaduḥkham /
GSP31jaymangu:1836: etattvādhyātmikaṃ duḥkhe 'ntarbhūtamaprītaduḥkhaṃ buddhyādhyavasitaṃ puruṣaḥ prāpnoti tasya cetanatvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:1849: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā /
GSP31jaymangu:1852: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1855: svabhāvikamevedaṃ sarvaṃ jagannahi marudādayaḥ kenacit kriyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1858: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31jaymangu:1878: tathāhi mokṣārthaṃ viṣayopabhogārthaṃ cāyamārambha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1884: yaḥ kaścit devadattasvārtha eva parārtho rahititaṃ pravartate na parastapastakaroti (?)
GSP31jaymangu:1888: pradhānasyācetanatvātkathaṃ lokatraye puruṣaṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyojya dhyānena vipramocya nivarteta /
GSP31jaymangu:1907: madhvarthaṃ prasthitaḥ kaścid grāmābhyāśe tu mākṣikam /
GSP31jaymangu:1908: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1914: tadvat pralayāvasthāyāṃ puruṣo 'pi mokṣanimittaṃ yadautsukyaṃ tannivṛttaye pravartayetpradhānamiti // 58 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:1917: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate narttakī yathā nṛttāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1922: sā tathā raṅgasya nṛttaṃ darśayitvā tasmānnṛttānnivartate viramati,
GSP31jaymangu:1924: tathā puruṣasyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśya devādibhāvarūpaṃ gatā nivartate prakṛtiḥ pradhānamityarthaḥ // 59 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:1926: nanu ca naṭī raṅgāt svārthaṃ sādhayati,
GSP31jaymangu:1942: tasya puṃso 'rtho dvividhaḥ- viṣayopabhogaḥ kaivalyaṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:1954: yattu dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ tanmāyāvastu tucchakam // iti / atrāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1955: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1956: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31jaymangu:1959: etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāgvyaktātmanā prakāśayati na tvavyaktātmanāpi,
GSP31jaymangu:1960: yena jñānāvasthāyāṃ prakṛtermatirbhavati mama sūkṣmataraṃ na kiñcidaparamasti yaddraṣṭavyaṃ puruṣeṇa //
GSP31jaymangu:1968: tasmānna puruṣasya bandho nāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ mokṣo vetyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1969: tasmānna badhyate 'ddhā na mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31jaymangu:1970: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31jaymangu:1977: kasya tarhi bandhādaya ityāha- saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca prakṛtiriti /
GSP31jaymangu:1978: nanu ca tasyāḥ sukumāratvādbandhādayo na sambhavantyevetyatrāha- nānāśrayeṣurabhivajyate (?) /
GSP31jaymangu:1989: saivātmanaiva puruṣārthaṃ pratyātmānaṃ mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31jaymangu:1999: yaṃ puruṣamapekṣya jñānamutpādayati taṃ pratyavyaktamātmānaṃ saṃharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:2013: yadetat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ bhautikaṃ ca tasminna bhavāmi,
GSP31jaymangu:2024: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31jaymangu:2026: yat prakṛtijñānamutpadyate taṃ prati nivṛtaḥ prasavo liṅgabhūtasargākhyo yasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sa tathoktā /
GSP31jaymangu:2027: prasavanivṛttyā vā yo viṣayo viṣayebhyo nivartate tadvaśāt,
GSP31jaymangu:2032: yathā prekṣakaḥ pravarttitanṛttamupasaṃhṛtanṛttāṃ ca narttakīṃ paśyati,
GSP31jaymangu:2038: nanu ca yadi prakṛtirgarbhabhūḥpuruṣaṃ prati nivṛttaprasavā,
GSP31jaymangu:2039: tasyāśca prakṛtestadānīṃ sarvagatatvādastyeva saṃyogastatkimiti punaḥ śarīrotpattirna bhavatītyāha -
GSP31jaymangu:2041: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31jaymangu:2049: tataśca saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya /
GSP31jaymangu:2068: yathā kulālavyāpāre nivṛtte 'pi vegavaśāt kiyantamapi kālaṃ cakrabhramastiṣṭhati tathā śarīramapītyarthaḥ // 67 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2074: liṅgabhautikaśarīre pṛthagbhūte yathā saṃbhūte layaṃ gati teṣvityarthaḥ (?) //
GSP31jaymangu:2080: satyapi tayoḥ saṃyoge prayojanābhāvānna punaḥ sarga ityātyantikamiti // 68 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31jaymangu:2094: yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ sthityādayo vyavasthāpyante /
GSP31jaymangu:2096: sā ca triṣu sthāneṣu daivamānuṣatairyagyoneṣu utpattiḥ sṛṣṭapradhānāt yāvat tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni /
GSP31jaymangu:2105: tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31jaymangu:2112: tatra jñānākhyena bhāvenāndhe tamasi vartamānaṃ jagat dṛṣṭavato muneḥ karuṇotpannā /
GSP31jaymangu:2113: tayā ca preryamāṇa āsuriṃ sagotrabrāhmaṇaṃ varṣasahasrayātinamāgatyovāca /
GSP31jaymangu:2121: sa tu pradipadya gṛhasthadharmaṃ tyaktvā pravrajitaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:2127: āsurirapi tadeva saṃkṣiptaṃ pañcaśikhāya svaśiṣyāyānukampayā pradadau //
GSP31jaymangu:2128: 'tena'; iti / pañcaśikhena muninā bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram /
GSP31jaymangu:2132: nanu ca ṣaṣṭitantramevāstu kiṃ saptatyeti svaśāstrakaraṇaprayojanamāha-
GSP31jaymangu:2155: ityādinā granthena ya uktāste kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasyāpi //
GSP31jaymangu:2161: paraṃ bandhamokṣopayogino 'rthāḥ darśitā iti tasmāt sampūrṇeyaṃ saptatiriti // 72 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
